EmailTemplate.name: ATRDiscountReset_Aug2017.ATRDiscountReset_Aug2017
EmailTemplate.subject: Business Review and Adjustments
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Customer, As part of standard business reviews, Honeywell Aerospace has reviewed our customer accounts and identified that we do not have a distributor agreement with your company. As a result, our systems will automatically adjust your account to Honeywell standard list pricing as of October 16, 2017. Up until to that date, Honeywell will accept orders for items and quantities in line with your historical purchasing practices and at the discounted pricing you have been receiving for those items. This change does not impact your ability to purchase items from Honeywell, it merely resets your pricing in accordance with our pricing policy. This change does not affect the terms of any written agreement you have with Honeywell. If you have any questions, please contact your Honeywell representative. If you don't have a contact, please access the MyAerospace Portal <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/contact-us]]> for contact information <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/iujQ0ZIj0gq00G000002X00]]> or to submit a question.
Visit MyAerospace <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
